name: Murai Tower Defense
description:
In this game you play AS the samurai god, placing down and upgrading your minions as they pursue their destiny. Bugs are enroaching and they must be slain.

You can drag and drop your turrets as many times as you want! This means your turrets are never stuck in any one place.

Beta tester: [Ekoxe](https://ekoxe.itch.io/)
